snippet: The authorities in Jackson County, Mo., are investigating allegations that Bethany Deaton, 27, a nurse, was drugged, sexually assaulted and killed on the orders of her husband.
abstract: Authorities are investigating allegations that nurse Bethany Deaton of Kansas City, Mo, suburb Grandview was drugged, sexually assaulted and killed on orders of her husband Tyler Deaton; he is described as leader of local Christian sect International House of Prayer; sect member Micah Moore has confessed to murder, but Deaton and others are still under investigation.
lead_paragraph: The authorities in Jackson County, Mo., are investigating allegations that Bethany Deaton, 27, a nurse, was drugged, sexually assaulted and killed on the orders of her husband.

headline.seo: Twists in Bethany Deaton Murder Case Put Spotlight on Charismatic Sect
headline.main: Disputed Murder Confession Casts a Spotlight on a Missouri Sect
headline.print_headline: Disputed Murder Confession Casts a Spotlight on a Missouri Sect
